title: crusted ham
description: This divine ham is a dish you can just dive into - and the bread crust is perfect for mopping up the meat juices.
ingredients: 1 x 4-6kg/8¾-13¼lb raw ham, bone in, soaked overnight in cold water if necessary (check with your butcher)
600g/1¼lb floury potatoes such as Maris Piper, peeled and cut into large chunks
350g/12oz runner beans, trimmed and cut in half
small handful fresh mint leaves, torn in half
small handful fresh flatleaf parsley leaves, torn in half
1kg/2¼lb spelt flour, plus extra for dusting
2 x 7g sachets of fast-action dried yeast
